You also now get your 7th member of your team to help you defeat Demogargano. This is where you will roll one dice. If you get a 1 you get the “Bum Jesus” card, if you get a 2 you get the Norgren card, if you get a 3 or 4 you get Attila, and finally, if you get a 5 or 6 you get Astaroth. These cards feature different results. Norgren, Attila, and Astaroth all have 666 in one stat category making their total HP brought to the group a welcome asset and required in order to defeat Demogargano as he has 3 over 666 categories. Bum Jesus who you will receive if you roll a one has a 000 stat category making him able to sacrifice himself in order to defeat Demogargano without even rolling the dice. Meaning if you roll a 1 with the dice you win the game instantly.

The game can be played by two people or by yourself battling yourself to see who goes to fight Demogargano.

Gauntlet Mode:

In Run the Gauntlet mode the game play of HellBringers is the same except that when you and your opponent draw your first cards you instantly battle them. When the opponent’s card is defeated you will then put that card in a separate pile for later. The player then keeps the card with the battle damage of HP that was suffered from the battle. The opponent then draws another card and the battle damaged card from before fights that card. Both players get 6 cards in total and they battle this way until no cards are left for the opponent. The player then chooses 6 cards from his pile and the defeated pile to fight Demogargano and the rules are the same as Survivor Series for the final battle. See above.

Board Game Version:

Players rolls one dice.  Player moves spaces until reaching weapons card pick up slots, team builder slots, and also battle zones. Players have the option of killing player and gaining double attack or having player join their team in the battle zones. Weaker players would be a reason you would kill of a player in order to double your attack. At this point you are choosing the bolster your attack rather gain HP of total team. Weapons cards act as modifiers. Team building is the goal of the board along with minor battles before you make it to the end of the game where you fight Demogargano.  Unlike the card deck game version, you do not have the option of rolling for a special character at the end.  You must make up your team as you go and if you are defeated in battle you have to start over.  Game is 1-3 players and you can play by yourself as you just need to roll for the opponent as well during battles.  During battles doubles mean the same as in regular card deck versions of the game.

Amazing Contributing Artist

Incredible art from the likes of Mark May, Marat Mychaels, Bob Camp, Chris Giarrusso, Ed Smith, Sean Forney, Steven Pulawa, Ryan Kincaid, Phil Spaulding, Cara Nicole, Brady Overstreet, Rick Lozano, Russ Casseday, and Sara Frazetta (Her first published work, granddaughter of the GOAT Frank Frazetta)! Some of the best artists from the comic industry come together to make one HELL of a card game for you!  Pledge now to receive a game with challenging aspects, premium art, and overall fun to bed had!  These cards are gonna be collectors items for generations to come!

Name: ムラオサ (Muraosa)
Description:
ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚ªã‚µ (Muraosa) is a game that develops the village by becoming Osa of the village of Jomon period. Osa travels for the village, acquires various resources, and develops new technologies.

First, decide the destination. As Osa can only walk towards the destination, he needs to think and decide enough. 
Next step will of course walk. In the middle of the market, we will acquire various resources and pay new resources. 
Once you get to the destination, it's a score. Depending on the distance from your village, the higher you get the better score. After that, we return to the village, decide a new destination, and the next journey begins.

The map is made by combining nine boards. This combination requires a different strategy each time. In addition, because the action that can be done varies depending on the location of the village, you have to think of the strategy under the conditions different from other players. This asymmetry is also one of the features.

Name: Electronic Arcade Basketball
Description:
Each player takes 3 basketballs and places them in their court and starts the 60-second timer. Players place a ball on their shooter and flips it down to shoot the ball toward the basket on their side of the court. The game registers 2 points for every successful basket for the first 45 seconds, and 3 points for successful shots made in the remaining 15 seconds. The player with the most points wins.

Product Description:

Launch your thumbs into an intense B-ball competition!

Using the two spring-loaded catapults, finger-flicking B-ball pros get to go head to head to see who's the quickest flicker of them all.

Load the launchers with the mini basketballs and then press the "reset" button to start up the minute-long timer – Immediately the race is on!

Flick, launch, load, flick, launch - A fun sound confirms every shot you make while an electronic scoreboard keeps track of your score.

Ten, twelve, fourteen, sixteen, eighteen - Wow! You're on a roll! - But look out. Your opponent's catching up quick! - Better kick it into a higher gear.

During the last fifteen seconds, warning sounds intensify the excitement and each score becomes three points instead of two - Victory is in sight!

Whether you're starting up an extreme competition, playing a quick game of one on one, or just testing your skills against the timer, the Electronic Arcade Basketball game is quick to ignite hours of finger-sports action.

Name: おーくしょんパーティ (Auction Party)
Description:
ãŠãƒ¼ãã—ã‚‡ã‚“ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ (Auction Party) is a Japanese game.

A king of a fantasy country told the four favoured knights "Complete three quests in the next three months, and the one who earns more gold will marry the princess, and will be the next king!"The four knights hired experienced adventurers and left for the quest right away.

Auction Party! is mainly divided into two game parts (phases); the Auction phase and the Adventure phase.
In the auction phase, you bid on the characters in play and compete for them.
In the adventure phase, you will complete missions with the collected characters, using their status and skills.
Overcome the target value of each mission with the total value of the characters' status, and the die roll!

Use the special abilities of your hired heroes to survive the dungeon, beat the monsters, loot the treasure, and win the most gold over three rounds.
publisher's summary

Name: atommix
Description:
atommix is a card game visually portraying the 118 elements of the periodic table, allowing players to experience true chemistry through visual storytelling.

The art was created by Extra Crunchy and guest artists from different fields around the world, from street artists to visionary artists.

Each element is described by it's unique properties (or effects) by simple icons and artwork that tell the story of the element.
This makes it quick and easy to learn and remember true chemistry.

The game has 5 levels of play.
Each level adds complexity and strategy to the game.

Explore the elements by creating a "chain reaction".
Use the Action Cards: Alchemist, Atom Smasher and Nuclear fusion to manipulate and challenge the other players.

The winner is the first player to discard their last card.
If you love art and science this game is just for you.

—description from the designer

Name: Labyrinth: The Forever War, 2015-?
Description: Labyrinth: The Forever War, 2015 - ? is a 1-2 player card-driven boardgame simulating at the strategic level the ongoing bid by Islamist extremists to impose their brand of religious rule on the Muslim world. It continues where Labyrinth: The Awakening, 2010 - ? left off and adds new event cards and rules to cover the last five years of history. Since publication of Labyrinth and its first expansion, fans of the game have expressed a desire to update it based on more recent events, and a variety of event card ideas and variants have been freely shared online. This second expansion to the Labyrinth game series fulfills that continuing interest by providing up-to-date event cards and allows the game to continue to serve as an effective strategic level model of the ongoing struggles in the Muslim world.
Families: History: Conflicts against the Islamic State

Name: Saga: Age of Magic
Description:
SAGA Age of Magic - Fantasy is the crucible in which the most heroic tales are forged. In these worlds, a simple barbarian can become a king, an ancient sorcerer can unite whole races to make a stand against the shadows, and an army of the dead can rise.

Dragons, sorcerers, and paladins descend upon SAGA's gaming tables in the Age of Magic.

Design a war band from one of six factions, including new units like Monsters, Creatures and War Machines, and confront your opponents with the aid of powerful sorceries.

The Age of Magic is a complete SAGA Universe that includes:

     6 archetypal factions from the worlds of fantasy so you can use your collections of fantasy figures to play SAGA.
     Legendary units and war bands for each faction.
     New rules and equipment to represent these worlds' most iconic units.
     Complete rules for Magic.
     Over thirty spells divided into six Domains of Magic.


The Age of Magic is designed to give players all the tools they need to use their existing collections of fantasy figures, and to create their own gaming universe.

Included are six card Battle Boards.

—description from the publisher

Name: Deadly Disclosures: Murder in Chocville – A Murder Mystery Dinner
Description:
A murder has happened and any player in this game could be the perpetrator. Everybody is suspicious, has a shaky or no alibi and at least one motive.

Your job now is to identify the killer. You may ask each other anything that comes to mind. At the same time, you will receive various clues or evidence in different rounds of the game, which the players have to use skilfully. This makes it possible to track down the perpetrator and at the same time distract from yourself.

For this crime game you need 8 players. As a game arbitrator you can play along and assign yourself one of the roles. It is easily possible to prepare the murder mystery game without knowing the solution.

All information and material to run the game are free to download at www.hannover.de/en/murder-mystery.

The game perfectly combines the desire for criminal investigation and Fair Trade!

Name: Bushido: Risen Sun – Hiroto
Description:
Hiroto has returned to the Jwar Isles, but he is in no fit state to either raise hope in those scattered forces of the Shiho who still harbour loyalties nor incite fear in those that took all that was precious from his family. Read more about Hiroto here.

This model can be fielded as part of a warband affiliated with the following factions:

Jung Pirates
    Silvermoon Syndicate
    Tengu Descension

—description from the publisher

Name: Bushido: Risen Sun – Eldest Brother
Description:
Loyal to Hiroto, Drunken Master in ways that are difficult to describe, where Hiroto leads Eldest Brother follows. Read more about Eldest Brother here.

This model can be fielded as part of a warband affiliated with the following factions:

Cult of Yurei
    Jung Pirates
    Savage Wave
    Silvermoon Syndicate
    Temple of Ro-kan

—description from the publisher
